official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish and operate a National Museum an Repository of Black History and Culture at or near Wilberforce, Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish and operate a National Museum and Repository of Black History and Culture at or near Wilberforce, Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish and operate a National Museum an Repository of Black History and Culture at or near Wilberforce, Ohio.
